name: Chenyu Brew
desc: Common Liyue tea. Sometimes, one might compare life to the sweet aftertaste savored upon sipping a cup of tea.

value.text: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Recipe: Chenyu Brew
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Chenyu Brew.

customize.name: Chenyu Adeptea
customize.desc: Tea grown in warm, moist areas in Chenyu Vale. After millennia of careful cultivation, the tea today emits a rich fragrance that can be savored from several streets away.

customize.name: Delicious Chenyu Brew
customize.desc: Common Liyue tea. Your initial sip brings forth flavor on an elegant light breeze, the sweet fragrances of Chenyu Vale alighting upon your lips and tongue. Hark â€” is that the sweet tinkling of the mountain springs singing in your ear?

customize.name: Suspicious Chenyu Brew
customize.desc: Common Liyue tea. You find yourself constantly sipping at it doubtfully, only to confirm that yes, this so-called tea still tastes like water. Was the low temperature the problem, or has it not had enough time to steep?
